item.title: Probably Wrong Prediction:: If DJI and Insta360 are successful with their soon to be released 'real cameras' then Sony will definitely exit the camera business by 2030
item.description:
Previously

  • December 4, 2012: Nikon V1 might as well be free at $299 w/lens aka redonkulous price cuts mean desperate camera makers! One or more of Sony, Olympus, Ricoh, Pentax, or Samsung will exit the camera business in the next ten years

item.title: Volume up button. Volume down button. Press and hold the side button. When the Apple logo appears, release the side button. Had to reboot my phone using Apple's instructions to get the touchscreen working on Saturday
item.description: I followed these instructions from Apple : Force restart iPhone after Saturday‚Äôs touchscreen woes in the Vancouver temperate rainforest rain: January 31, 2026: Touchscreen buttons on iOS apps eg, Apeman rear video mirror app, don‚Äôt work on my iPhone16 Pro Max in constant rain

item.title: ME:: tl;dr-ing $30 USD metal lever for Hario Switch ; Flip Switch (Metal Lever Upgrade for Hario Switch) ‚Äì Foundry Coffeeworks
item.description: Discovered: Feb 2, 2026 18:16 (UTC) ME:: tl;dr-ing $30 USD metal lever for Hario Switch ; Flip Switch (Metal Lever Upgrade for Hario Switch) ‚Äì Foundry Coffeeworks <‚Äì If I ever get a Hario Switch, I‚Äôd get this. cheaper than the Good Switch which looks like a lovely product for $USD119 <‚Äì QUOTE: Upgrade your Hario Switch experience with the Flip Switch, a premium replacement lever designed for the Hario Switch brewer. Meticulously crafted from food-grade 304 stainless steel, the Flip Switch offers enhanced durability, smooth operation, and a polished finish that adds a touch of refined elegance to your setup.

item.title: Combating DHS Lies <-- There I fixed it for you Minnesota :-) ; Combating DHS Misinformation / Department of Corrections
item.description: Discovered: Feb 1, 2026 14:58 (UTC) Combating DHS Lies <‚Äì There I fixed it for you Minnesota :-) ; Combating DHS Misinformation / Department of Corrections <‚Äì QUOTE: This page exists to correct the Department of Homeland Security's (DHS) repeated false claims regarding the Minnesota Department of Corrections' (DOC) cooperation with Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE). Please see the below media fact sheet, press releases, and videos for more information.

item.title: OPM:: Paki Sabi, White Toyota, all such great songs by Sunkissed Lola ; SunKissed Lola - Wikipedia
item.description: Discovered: Jan 28, 2026 18:28 (UTC) OPM:: Paki Sabi, White Toyota, all such great songs by Sunkissed Lola ; SunKissed Lola - Wikipedia <‚Äì Paki Sabi and White Toyota on YouTube <‚Äì QUOTE: Prior to the band's formation, Laura Lacbain, Danj Quimson, and Genson Viloria were bandmates in the band Dr. Pocket from 2018 to 2021. They released 4 songs and one of those songs "Paki Sabi" was re-released through SunKissed Lola.

I know you can do this via API calls but I‚Äôm kinda done instaling pkgs with egregious dependencies, and TIL you can export CSV ranges from ghseets:

https[:]//docs[.]google[.]com/spreadsheets/d/DAFT-GOOGLE-SHEETS-IDENTIFIER/edit?gid=ANOTHER-DAFT-IDENTIFIER#gid=YET-ANOTHER-DAFT-IDENTIFIER&range=A2:M44

item.title: ME:: I don't think we live in The Singuarity but I can see how this is useful. See also: The Data Flywheel pattern and Claude Code, not code ; Will Schenk:: How I Use AI in Jan 2026
item.description:
Discovered: Jan 27, 2026 07:11 (UTC) ME:: I don‚Äôt think we live in The Singuarity but I can see how this is useful. See also: The Data Flywheel pattern and Claude Code, not code ; Will Schenk:: How I Use AI in Jan 2026 ‚Äì> See also The Data flywheel pattern which has 3 examples and Claude Code, not code

QUOTE:

  • Read the whole thing: Will Schenk:: How I Use AI in Jan 2026

This is what it feels like to live in The Singularity. The amount of change and discovering for what AI can do is staggering, and what was cutting edge on Monday seems to be ho-hum by Friday. So, in the spirit of ‚Äúthis will be out dated by the time I press publish‚Äù I wanted to share how I use AI.
